members.description: Whether to display a Close button in the TitleWindow container. The default value is false. Set it to true to display the Close button. Selecting the Close button generates a close event, but does not close the TitleWindow container. You must write a handler for the close event and close the TitleWindow from within it.

values: If true, the close button is displayed

events.description: Dispatched when the user selects the close button.
